title: You have not been able to reconnect to chat.
body:
In the beta client after some games (usually but not exclusive to the ones where i DC for a small amount of time due to a poor internet provider) When i go back to the beta client it says i had disconnected from the chat and it cant reconnect, so i restart the client.

This to my knowledge only started after the latest client update (about a week ago) and i'm not the only one i know experiencing it

replies.body:
Since patches and updates only touch local files in your League directory, it's *extremely unlikely* they would impact your ability to connect to a specific server. This issue is often caused by certain network settings that conflict with League, so I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address common solutions.

Let me know if those steps resolved this.
